sentences.en: A performer in evening dress plays classical selections on the violin.
sentences.cn: 一名身穿晚礼服的表演者用小提琴演奏了几段古典音乐。

sentences.en: Classical music leaves me absolutely cold, but I love rock.
sentences.cn: 古典音乐一点也引不起我的兴趣, 我喜欢搖滾乐.

sentences.en: Classical scientific ideas about light were changed by Einstein.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦改变了物理学上关于光的传统观念.

sentences.en: Gardiner has pursued relentlessly high standards in performing classical music.
sentences.cn: 加德纳一直不懈地追求古典音乐演奏的高水准。

sentences.en: He said that the new building merely aped the classical traditions.
sentences.cn: 他说那栋新建筑只是模仿古典传统.

sentences.en: He studies classical literature , but also takes an interest in history.
sentences.cn: 他专攻古典文学, 旁及历史.

sentences.en: Her writing style was reminiscent of ancient classical writers.
sentences.cn: 她的写作风格使人联想到古代的古典作家.

sentences.en: His music fused the rhythms of jazz with classical forms.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐把爵士乐的节奏和古典乐的形式结合在了一起。

sentences.en: Marsalis has a formidable reputation in both jazz and classical music.
sentences.cn: 马萨利斯在爵士乐和古典音乐领域都有极高的声望。

sentences.en: She listens to classical music for relaxation.

sentences.cn: 该电台不得不播放大量的古典音乐。

sentences.cn: 塑像的这颗头颅一定在古罗马时代就已经被发现,而且被谨慎地保存着.
